smoke thereof shall go up for ever. The phrases it shall not be quenched night nor day and smoke…shall go up forever remind one of hell.

generation to generation/lie waste. When Christ comes to destroy the world (Edom) at his second coming, the effects of this destruction will last "for ever and ever," for the world will be renewed and become a paradisiacal sphere during the Millennium. "None shall pass through it for ever and ever" for the same reason—that state of the earth will no longer exist.
